title.description: Specify a string that would be used for document title.

author.description: Specify a string that would be used for document author.

documentclass.description: Specify the document class that is for LATEX translation, such as *report*. The default is empty, in which case *article* is chosen for non-book generation and *book* is chosen for book generation.

documentclassopts.description: Specify a list of options separated by spaces that would be attached to the \documentclass command of LATEX, such as *twocolumn*.

stepspaces.description: Number of spaces count as an indentation level. Must be set between 1 and 8. Default is 2.

stepmargin.description: Left margin increment (in centimeters) for each indentation. Must be set between 0 and 10. Default is 0.85

parskip.description: Set it to true to simulate the effect of the 'parskip' package, that each paragraph is visibly separated by extra vertical spaces inserted and no indentation is produced. Set it to false to disable this behavior.

outlineonly.description: Set it to true to show only headings.

sections.description: Set it to one or more heading numbers (separated by spaces) for which its contents will be shown in when *outlineonly* mode is on.

showlabels.description: Set it to true to show a label that is assigned to each sectional headings as well as to figures and listings.

outlinelevel.description: Set it to a number between 0-6 to include chapters, sections, subsections, subsubsections, and others.

leftmargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the left margin in centimeters.

rightmargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the right margin in centimeters.

topmargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the top margin in centimeters.

leftmarginTC.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the left margin in centimeters.

rightmarginTC.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the right margin in centimeters.

topmarginTC.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the top margin in centimeters.

twocolumn.description: Set it to true if two column is to be shown for a page.

samplewrap.description: Set it to an integer for which lines longer than this will be wrapped.

samplewrapTC.description: Set it to an integer for which lines longer than this will be wrapped (in twocolumn mode).
